Another campaign speech thinly disguised as the SOTU address. There will be at least one per week between now and November.
 
 Obama's primary objectives:
 
 1. Take credit for whatever little that works.
 2. If it doesn't, blame Bush, the Republicans and Wall Street.
 3. Fly around the country on Air Force One.

post_info.post_title: Speeches, Blame and Air Force One.

Another campaign speech thinly disguised as the SOTU address. There will be at least one per week between now and November.
 
 Obama's primary objectives:
 
 1. Take credit for whatever little that works.
 2. If it doesn't, blame Bush, the Republicans and Wall Street.
 3. Fly around the country on Air Force One.

 
 Why should the comming year be any different then the last.

I enjoyed it.

 
 It was rather humorous. Freeze spending...priceless!

And "most" of the bailout money has been repaid. "Most" means 66% of the money that went to the banks, which received about 35% of the total bailout. So "most" is really about 23% of the total 700 billion. We are going to lose countless billions elsewhere, but at least "most" of the money has been repaid. emoticon_rolleyes

I only caught the last 20 minutes or so of the SOTU address but I can't stand the arrogance of the little b@#$%d! He talks about bipartisanship from one side of his mouth and badmouths Republicans from the other side. What a hypocrite. And he blasted the SCOTUS, something that was classless at best and intimidating at its worst over an isse that he has his facts wrong on. Foreigners have been excluded from contributing from campaigns and the SCOTUS ruling left those exclusions in place.
 It is also the audacity of arrogance for him to even attempt to defend campaign reform when he went back on his promise to McCain to accept public funding for his campaign when he realized that he could generate more money by rejecting public funding. He's a hypocrite of the worst kind! :xcensored
The real whiners are the Republicans who yowl about being excluded, forgetting that they bit Obama's hand off when he extended it to him.

.... Foreigners have been excluded from contributing from campaigns and the SCOTUS ruling left those exclusions in place....

 
 And your proof is?

And your proof is?

 
 Read the ruling. You ARE capable of reading aren't you?emoticon_rolleyes
